mapper.select:
select prdt_code, prdt_name, prdt_type from prdt_table
prdt_code = #{prdtCode}

select chk_std_code, chk_name, chk_dt, chk_std from chk_std
chk_std_code = #{chkStdCode}
select l.chk_std_code, l.prdt_chk_num, l.prdt_code, c.chk_std, c.chk_name, c.chk_dt from prdt_chk_list l join chk_std c on l.chk_std_code = c.chk_std_code where l.prdt_code = #{prdtCode}
mapper.insert: insert into prdt_chk_list(chk_std_code, prdt_chk_num, prdt_code, chk_std) values ( #{chkStdCode}, #{prdtChkNum}, #{prdtCode}, #{chkStd} )
mapper.select:
SELECT i.prod_inst_code, r.prcs_edate prod_inst_date,
r.prcs_rs_code,
c.prdt_chk_cnt, get_prdt_name(c.prdt_code) prdt_name, c.prdt_code, c.prdt_chk_code FROM prdt_chk c JOIN process_result r ON c.prcs_rs_code = r.prcs_rs_code JOIN process p ON r.prcs_code = p.prcs_code JOIN dt_prod_inst d ON p.dt_prod_inst_code = d.dt_prod_inst_code JOIN prod_inst i ON d.prod_inst_code = i.prod_inst_code
WHERE c.prdt_chk_sit = 'n'

SELECT s.chk_name, s.chk_std,
c.chk_std_code, c.prdt_chk_num FROM prdt_chk_list c JOIN chk_std s ON c.chk_std_code = s.chk_std_code
WHERE c.prdt_code = #{prdtCode} ORDER BY c.chk_std_code
mapper.insert: insert into dt_prdt_chk( prdt_chk_code, prdt_code, chk_std_code, prdt_chk_val, prdt_chk_fit, prdt_manager ) values ( #{prdtChkCode}, #{prdtCode}, #{chkStdCode}, #{prdtChkVal}, #{prdtChkFit}, #{prdtManager} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.prdt_chk_code, p.prcs_rs_code, p.prdt_code, p.prdt_chk_cnt, p.prdt_chk_result, t.prdt_name, MAX(p.prdt_chk_date) AS prdt_chk_date, MAX(d.prdt_manager) AS prdt_manager FROM prdt_chk p JOIN dt_prdt_chk d ON p.prdt_code = d.prdt_code JOIN prdt_table t ON d.prdt_code = t.prdt_code GROUP BY p.prdt_chk_code, p.prcs_rs_code, p.prdt_code, p.prdt_chk_cnt, p.prdt_chk_result, t.prdt_name

SELECT p.prdt_chk_code, p.prdt_code, p.prcs_rs_code,
c.chk_name, c.chk_std,
d.prdt_chk_val, d.prdt_chk_fit
FROM prdt_chk p JOIN dt_prdt_chk d ON p.prdt_chk_code = d.prdt_chk_code JOIN chk_std c ON d.chk_std_code = c.chk_std_code
WHERE p.prdt_chk_code = #{prdtChkCode}
select * from prdt_chk c JOIN prdt_table t ON c.prdt_code = t.prdt_code WHERE c.prdt_chk_result = '적합' and c.prdt_fin_chk = '입고전'
